overview: Julián, a nine-year-old boy lives with his single father, who experiences a terrible curse during the night that turns him into a beast after midnight. Julián will devise a plan to get his dad out of that spell, but little by little we will see that not everything is what it seems.

production_companies.name: Centro de Diseño, Cine y Televisión

tagline: Come. I'm going to tell you a story.
title: The Living Storybook
